sentences.en: A comparative expensive unit from a reputable instrument firm is a wise investment.
sentences.cn: 购买有名气的厂家的较贵的器械是一种明智的投资.

sentences.en: Always buy from a reputable dealer.
sentences.cn: 购买商品时一定要选择信誉良好的贸易商.

sentences.en: If the company is a member, it’s a good sign that they are reputable (but not always).
sentences.cn: 如果公司是成员之一，一个好标志就是他们的名声好 (但不总是这样)。

sentences.en: Indeed, the latest projections from reputable climate scientists border on the apocalyptic.
sentences.cn: 真的, 来自一些著名的气候科学家的最新预测接近了启示录.

sentences.en: It has since mutated into an annual ordeal for reputable universities.
sentences.cn: 当时,为挑出全国最好的大学,杂志向662所高校的校长发出了调查问卷.

sentences.en: Luxembourg produces six reputable and relatively inexpensive white wines.
sentences.cn: 卢森堡生产六种价格相对低廉的名牌白葡萄酒.

sentences.en: Other interests , less reputable , were in the background too.
sentences.cn: 还有一些名声稍小的有产者也在做他的后盾.

sentences.en: Our company is a reputable state - run real estate developing company.
sentences.cn: 我公司是一家资深的 国有 房地产开发公司.

sentences.en: Simplicity of language is not only reputable, but perhaps even sacred.
sentences.cn: 简练的语言,不仅合乎语言规范, 同时也是庄重的.

sentences.en: There have always been reputable and competent scientists that have disagreed with new theories.
sentences.cn: 对于新的理论,总是会有著名的权威的科学家表示异议.

sentences.en: They are all intelligent, reputable men and all judges of good wine.
sentences.cn: 他们都是聪明有为, 声名卓著的人物和评品好酒的行家.

sentences.en: To avoid being cheating, we should look a reputable real estate agent.
sentences.cn: 为避免受骗, 找房地产代理商时,要注意他们的名声.
我们只使用声誉好的运输公司.

sentences.en: We prefer to deal only with reputable companies.
sentences.cn: 我们只喜欢和有声誉的公司打交道.

sentences.en: We will continue to bring you in coverage of reputable competition worldwide.
sentences.cn: 我们将不断向您介绍世界各地受欢迎的比赛的信息.

sentences.en: You are well advised to buy your car through a reputable dealer.
sentences.cn: 强烈建议您通过值得信赖的经销商购车。

words.tran_cn: 名誉好的；被普遍认为…的
认为（repute的过去式和过去分词）

trans.tran_en: respected for being honest or for doing good work
